resources.string: Sorry, there\'s no web browser available

St. Andrew’s School commits itself to the following: 
1. Evangelization and Christian formation of the youth 
2. Excellence in curricular and co-curricular programs 
3. Integral development of the human person 
4. Solidarity with the poor 
5. Faithful service to God and country (pro Deo et patria)
St Andrew\'s School of the Diocese of Parañaque envisions itself as a steward of quality and relevant Catholic Education in the service of the Church and society

Beloved St. Andrew’s The knowledge we obtain From the Lord God above Through thy guidance and love. 
You inspire our will To reach our Golden Goal Love God and Country Proudly we proclaim. 
Refrain: Hail St. Andrew's Endless fountain of wisdom We do pledge our life of serving love. 
The bright and shining morning Comes in our life We the Andreans give respect To thy enlightening command. 
We shall cherish you from here and afar With you the darkest road We’ll walk unafraid. 
(Repeat Refrain 2x)
